origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EnvironmentalAPI.analyze_data', 'description': 'This function analyzes the environmental quality data for a specific real estate project based on the project ID and data type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'projectId', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The unique identifier for the real estate project.'}, {'name': 'data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data to analyze, e.g., environmental_quality_data, impact_analysis.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis results of the environmental quality data for the project.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EnvironmentalAPI.analyze_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'projectId'是'12345', 'data'是'environmental_quality_data'.
